it.unifi.rc.httpserver

Class HTTPOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unifi.rc.httpserver.HTTPOutputStream
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyHTTPOutputStream

    public abstract class HTTPOutputStream
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that writes HTTPRequest/HTTPReply into a given OutputStream.
    Author:
    loreti

      Creates an instance of HTTPOutputStream that uses the OutputStream passed as parameter.
